channel.title: oof on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in oof on Barefoot Rob

item.title: headache
item.description: 11:42 Tuesday 11 October 2016 JST I have a headache, which I think is due to too much computering. How interesting that today’s lesson topic was compulsory vacation days. 19:24 Tuesday 11 October 2016 JST Headache is better after going home for a nice nap and a little pink tablet Lin gave me in case of headache. Also just walked to Olympic to buy two liters of orange juice.

item.title: speaking of posture
item.description: 19:03 Friday 08 July 2016 JST The previously written entry was written on Wednesday night. I’ve been toting my computer around today Friday, and spent an hour working on some worksheet for possible new class starting in September, after deploying a new version of CB websites. In today’s advanced class, I talked about fiat currency and WTC7, and the students were like “realllllyyyyy?????” so I invited them to look it up.
